Question: EDGE Sound Research CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
EDGE Sound Research

Product 1

- Sonus faber Suprema speaker system
- Priced at $750,000
- 4/5-way system with 8 front-firing speakers and 2 back-firing drivers
- Matching elliptical subwoofers with 15-inch transducers
- Dual mono and fully balanced electronic crossover
- Built with carbon fiber, wood, solid aluminum, and Italian leather
- Available for order from the Sonus faber website

Product 2

- FiiO R9 desktop streamer and headphone amp/DAC
- Supports wired and wireless headphones, active speakers, smartphones, and PCs
- Power output of up to 7300mW
- HDMI ARC port, SD and USB ports, optical, coaxial, and ethernet inputs
- Supports 2.4GHz/5GHz Wi-Fi and Bluetooth 5.0
- 8-Channel ESS Sabre ES9038PRO DACs
- Onboard storage expandable to 2TB via SD card
- Full-HD 6-inch color touchscreen display
- Priced at $1,499
- Available from mid-January

Product 3

- Klipsch Flexus series soundbars, subwoofers, and satellite speakers
- Flexus Core 100 ($299) and 200 ($499) soundbars
- Sub 100 subwoofer and Surr 100 surrounds
- Made by Onkyo with amp included
- Soundbars feature Dirac Live room correction
- Due out by April with further innovations to the lineup coming in the future

Product 4

- Focal Aria Evo X series speakers
- Consists of five models for music and home cinema
- Aria Evo X N째1 ($2,398) compact bookshelf speaker
- Aria Evo X N째2 ($4,798), N째3 ($5,198), N째4 ($5,998) floorstanding speakers
- Aria Evo X ($999) center speaker
- Incorporates sonic improvements with flax cone and 'M'-shaped inverted dome tweeter
- Available in black high gloss, walnut, and moss green high gloss finishes

Product 5

- Victrola Stream Sapphire record player
- Offers better-than-Bluetooth wireless integration with high-quality vinyl playback
- Multiple wireless connectivity options controlled via the Victrola app
- Streams vinyl to Sonos speakers and UPnP networked devices
- RCA outputs for wired systems or powered speakers
- MDF plinth with walnut veneer and adjustable-height aluminum feet
- Upgraded motor design and audiophile-grade Ortofon 2M Blue cartridge
- Expected to sell for $1,499 in spring 2024

Product 6

- Sennheiser Momentum True Wireless 4
- Built on the Qualcomm S5 Sound Gen 2 platform and Snapdragon Sound Technology
- Supports Auracast, improved Adaptive ANC, and upgraded battery system
- Qi charging case and quick charging over USB-C
- Expected to be available to pre-order from the Sennheiser website from next month
- Priced at $299

Product 7

- Mojawa HaptiFit Terra bone-conduction headphones
- Integrated smart sports device with haptic technology, bone conduction audio, and AI Sports Trainer
- Lightweight and comfortable with dynamic sound and sports tracking
- Connects via Bluetooth with 32GB of storage and IP68 protection
- Battery life runs to 8 hours and recharges in one hour
- Available in March for $299 with $100 off for pre-orders
